articles.title: US records over a million cases in one day - eNCA
articles.description: Despite the record numbers, many Americans are still reluctant to get Covid-19 vaccine booster shots.
articles.content:
NEW YORK - The Omicron Covid-19 variant is wreaking havoc in the US.
Data from Johns Hopkins University reveals the country recorded over a million infections on Monday.
A new record for that count… [+207 chars]
